abstract: De Beers reports record sales of diamond jewelry in 2014 due to increased demand in United States, China and India, but predicts 2015 will be less profitable.
lead_paragraph: De Beers said global diamond jewelry sales increased by 3 percent last year to a record of over $80 billion, but it warned that 2015 would be tough for the industry.

headline.main: Diamond Jewelry Sales in 2014 Set Record, De Beers Says
headline.print_headline: Diamond Jewelry Sales in 2014 Set Record, De Beers Says

snippet: De Beers said global diamond jewelry sales increased by 3 percent last year to a record of over $80 billion, but it warned that 2015 would be tough for the industry.
